review:
I found Dr. Pai as most efficient and a true professional.... he used modern techniques for the implant treatment. It was bit complicated, which he made very simple. 
Now I can smile wide......

** ******** *** ** *** *** ** * ******* He discussed the case with me breaking it down so that i could understand exactly what the problem was. ** ** *** ** *** **** ******** **** * **** **** ******* i would like to recommend him to all my friends and family

First I was worried about how IT would look .. The doctor gave me options about the treatment I found the filling option better .. So went for it .. The doctor did a wonderful job ..! Would definitely recommend him ! Thank you so much

A soothing ambience with charismatic interiors, ideal for a clinic to give their patients a feeling of relaxation and care right from the first appointment. Professional and caring staff, ready to always go out of the way to help you with any issues. Treatment process an excellent combination of professionalism and care. Appreciate the steady work behaviour of the doctor, unlike other doctors who are in a rush. Overall excellent.
Very neat and tidy place ideal for a clinic. Very good coordination regarding appointments.Good and friendly staff.
